Sec. Kelly: But every day, we are vigilant. Every day we are prepared. Every day we will do our jobs. (2/2) #DHSLive
Sec. Kelly: We live in a dangerous world. Those dangers are increasing, & changing speed and direction every single day. (1/2) #DHSLive
Sec. Kelly: We will never apologize for making our country more secure. #DHSLive

Sec. Kelly: We have been actively securing our borders & enforcing immigration laws. #DHSLive
